content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, nice to meet you. Let's start with the rental price. What is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given that the apartment is newly built and in the city center, I understand that the cost may be high. However, I am a student and I am willing to offer 400 Euro per month for the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is indeed a low offer given the excellent condition and prime location of the apartment. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding the condition and location of the apartment, I am willing to increase my offer. I am, however, on a tight budget as a student, so I propose 425 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While your offer is better, I am still looking for more. The apartment's condition and location certainly justify a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the condition and location of the apartment, I understand that the price could be higher. As a student, I am trying to balance the quality of the apartment with my budget. I am willing to offer 450 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Your offer is getting closer to what I am looking for, but I am still hoping for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given my budget as a student, I understand that my offers might not meet your expectations. However, I am willing to offer 475 Euro per month for the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Your offer is getting closer to what I am looking for. I am willing to accept your offer of 475 Euro per month. Here's the agreement statement: 'I agree to the price of 475 [x] Euro!'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 475 Euro per month!
name: Haoyu Wang from China
